author: Steve_OS
title: WWE 2K16 Video - Creation Suite
text: # 1 Mercury112491 @ 10/14/15 09:35 AM Looks good but didn't really show how in depth it is. Was that Dr Tracksuit in the NXT part? # 2 Bard @ 10/14/15 09:58 AM Maybe I wasn't looking for the right things...? Overall wasn't super impressed, though I'm sure I'll enjoy it way more when I'm doing it and making my own everything. Sent from my SM-G900V using Tapatalk # 3 CM Hooe @ 10/14/15 11:01 AM I'd like to know what's all-new about "Create A Show", especially with reference to how it is different from WWE 2K14. # 4 Reed1417 @ 10/14/15 11:15 AM It is a trailer so I shouldn't have been expecting an in depth look. But I'm really glad we have this stuff back. Now I just have to wait a tad bit longer to dive in haha. Reed is comin' atcha!!
